definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: SW. of Palestine, on E. border of Egypt;—Ge 16:7 (J; ´[[דֶּרֶךְ שׁ]]:), Ge 20:1 (E), towards Egypt Ge 25:18 (J), 1Sa 15:7, [[שׁ֫וּרָה]] 1Sa 27:8; ´[[מִדְּבַּר־שׁ]]: Ex 15:22 (J).—Oft. supposed to denote properly the ‘wall’ or line of fortresses, built by Egyptian kings across isthmus of Suez; but dub.: cf. Dr:Hast. DB SHUR.
